name: Santa's Slaybells (Read Description Before Playing)
description:
Please read the controls before playing!

Santa attempts to recover his lost presents from a nearby cottage, however, a surprise lurks in store...

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Number keys (1-3) - Change weapon
  • O and P keys - Alter mouse sensitivity (Initial sensitivity may be too high/low)

Standalone version (Runs smoother than in browser)

Developped in Unity for the 2020 Yogscast Jingle Jam Game Jam!

Credits: Brandon Jackson (Coding+Art), Frank Taylor (Music+Audio), Jake Cheung (Art Assistance)
